title: aDiyEnum uDanE
sahitya:
aDiyEnum uDanE kaDaittEri viDavE aruLai vAriyE tarum karuNai kUraiyA murugA


anupallavi

  vaDivEluDanE sEval koDiyumE piDittu vaDa pazhani mEviDum vaDivazhaguDaiyavA


caraNam    paDi mIdunnaDiyAr iDarEdu paDa viDAdu uDanukkuDan avarait-taDuttATkoLvOnE
taDai Edum ariyAda koDaikkaram uDaiyavA kaDaiyEn enrennai kai viDAdE ayyA
